summary: This is a modular armor set based on my DMRA Oblivion body mods.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Helgenrogue Armor
Author: Edhildil
12,17,2014
ver1




[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

This is a modular armor set based on my DMRA Oblivion body mods.You can wear

the different pieces as you choose, from skimpy to moderate. The more pieces

you wear the higher your armor rating.

Location: See Screenshots. In a respawnable chest on a rock by the river very

close to the Guardian Stones. From the Guardian Stone head down towards the

lake and its right there by the rivers edge.

The world model for the armor pieces looks like a book, and acts like one.

That means if you drop one of the items it will look like a book and it will

look like a book in your inventory. Why? Because it is funny.

Pieces include:

Outer Vest
Inner Vest
Bikini
Gloves
Sleeves
Boots
Leggings
Belt with Bags
Skirt


mods in screenshots include:

Hair: Apachii SkyHair female pack
Skin: Sporty Sexy Sweat, SG Textures Renewal CBBE
Eyes: The Eyes of Beauty

[youtube]80J2EO9XqYI[/youtube]

[img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/3664/updatesb.png[/img]
[color=#f6b26b]
[color=#ffd966]April 28 2015:[/color][/color] Added two files that allow the armor from the chest to be tempered. [color=#ffd966]Requires Main or optional Sevenbase files.[/color]

[color=#ffd966]March 2 2015:[/color] Added Sevenbase Bombshell, Cleavage, and Natural conversions to Optional files, weighted for BBP so you'll need a BBP skeleton or it will CTD. Also requires High Heel System. With working Weight sliders! Thank you Jordick! [color=#ffd966]First download and overwrite the Main file for the textures! [/color]


Optional file made without the High Heel scripts for thos who do not use HDT High Heels System


New version adds non HDT High Heel boots to the chest and fixed the texture of the ground item.


If someone wants to convert this to Bodyslide 2 or another body type go for

it. It would be nice to make it mod dependant though so please keep that in

mind. I have no idea how to use Outfit Studio.

[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]


Calientes CBBE body mod installed and running in your game.(textures)

Sevenbase textures and BBP skeleton for Sevenbase conversions (new!)

HDT High Heels system (For High Heel version, not required for regular CBBE version in optional files)

Â 
[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]


Unzip Data file to a temporary location
Check folder paths and make adjustments if needed
copy/paste into Skyrim folder.



Uninstallation:

Delete Data_meshes_armor_edhildil_helgenrogue folder
Delete Data_textures_armor_edhildil_helgenrogue folder
Delete Edhildils Helgenrogue Armor esp. file


[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]

Caliente for CBBE
Edhildil for the Original armor
Jordick for Sevenbase conversions
Edhildil and BB Drac for the heels

Tools used:
=======
Blender
Nifscope
GIMP 2


Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed

in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so

I can check out your mod.
